beer.name: 471 IPA
beer.description: Hoppy? Brother, 471 IPA redefines hoppy. 471 is a small batch, limited edition ale that was created by our Brewmaster to separate the weak from the strong. 471 is a double IPA, that combines Pale, Munich, Caramel-30, Carapils and Torrified Wheat malts, with Chinook, Centennial, Simcoe and Fuggles hops. It has a big sweet mouthfeel, followed by more hoppiness than you've ever had at one time. Enjoy.
beer.grains: Pale, Munich, Caramel-30, Carapils, Torrified Wehat
Pale, Munich, Caramel-30, Carapils, Torrified Wehat
